channel.title: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!
channel.description:
[b]Summary![/b] RSC Mini is yet another RSC Private Server, but this time we have cut the world map!
We have left Edgeville and the wilderness and added skilling possibilities to this map. Edgeville is the Home-Town and there are no more shops where you can buy your armour, weapons or accesories at.
It's all about manufacturing your own weaponry to engage the great wilderness fights or get that rare loot from one of the wilds most feared monsters.
Check out these awesome screenshots below!
Overall View of the new Edgeville: [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/906/rscmini1.png[/img]
Fishing spot and fishermans shop: [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/2256/rscmini2.png[/img]
Certers in Edgeville (Dragon Bone certer and Potion certer will be added somewhere later) [img]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/6849/rscmini3.png[/img]
Woodcut possibilities (Willows next to Mining entrance and Oaks over the map) [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/7369/rscmini4.png[/img]
Crafters workshop [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/7418/rscmini5.png[/img]
New Mining Guild (No requirements to enter) [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/8076/rscmini6.png[/img]
Smithing workshop (And crafting gold ofcourse) [img]http://img860.imageshack.us/img860/4535/rscmini7.png[/img]
[b]RSC Mini Features:[/b] - Herblaw shop in Edgeville - Mining Guild located below Edgeville - All sorts of trees in Edgeville - Redone Edgeville Dungeon with other NPC's - Low Level Fishing in Edgeville - High Level Fishing by taking the boat from Edgeville to an Island - Smithing and Crafting in the Old Edgeville Men-House - Clay, Gold and Silver mine located below Edgeville - Chaos Druids close to bank to gather Herbs for Herblaw. - World Drop feature that drops a specific item all over the world. - Partyroom Drop Feature that drops a specific item multiple times in the party room. - RSC Angels "Global War" - Cow Farm east of Edgeville to train Crafting and low level combat training.
[b]Upcoming Features:[/b] - Better magic and ranging posibilities - A Subscribers only house with a dungeon for high level training and better skilling possibilities (slightly easier to gather/bank items) - Add the "Charge Dragonstone Amulet" fountain to the Subscribers house - etc
[b]RSC Mini Teaser Video![/b] [url=http://videobam.com/wsjHo]http://videobam.com/wsjHo[/url]
[b]FAQ:[/b] [u]Q: When is RSC Mini going to be released?[/u] [u]A:[/u] We do not have an estimated release date yet, there is still a lot that needs to be done
[u]Q: How do I get armour and weapons when there are no shops?[/u] [u]A:[/u] You will either have to manufacture your own, buy it from other people or get it as a drop from a npc.
[u]Q: What will the EXP Rate be?[/u] [u]A:[/u] I still need to decide this, but I'm thinking about x12 for non-subs and x16 for subscribers.
[b]Staff Applications![/b] RSC Mini still needs staff, I have multiple jobs open!
[u]Landscape Editor[/u] Info: I need someone that helps making new dungeons, it is a pre if you can and know how to add NPC's and GameObjects to this LandScape aswell!
[u]Java developper[/u] Info: Anyone that can help fix bugs is appreciated! A good java developper will also earn a part of the subscriptions.
[u]Website developper[/u] For now I am using a website released by sw0o0sh, if anyone is near as good as him and interested in working for RSC Mini, contact me!
[u]Moderators[/u] Info: I need a couple of Moderators that have past experience with RSC Private Servers, Moderators need to be mature, can speak decent English and trustworthy.
You may either post here, but you can also whisper me if interested!
[u]Let us know what you think about this project, suggestions are welcome too![/u]

item.title: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Kapitein Bier, post:23, topic:392797”][quote author=OldSkoolRSC link=topic=489964.msg3601518#msg3601518 date=1305616073]

Still working on it, waiting for xEnt to release Mopar Classic first though.

why?

Release first and ull get the attention of all these trolls waiting for mopars server, you will loose almost all of them to mopar when it releases but some may come back after some time has passed when thier justin bieber phase has worn off. Release second and they’ll be too busy grinding and farming and wont even bother trying out some “2nd rate server” for lack of a better word, giving you the oppotunity to mould ur server around what these players dislike about mopars.
[/quote]

Why?

I am, as xEnt is, using RSC Angel source.
xEnt has fixed some bugs concerning packet spamming, etc… bugs I am not capable of fixing. since Mopar Classic is going to be open source I am able to rip these fixes out and implement these in RSC Mini.

The next reason is because I am re-doing the whole map, I have to manually add objects and npc’s (which takes kind of long since I don’t have these in a MySQL database, but in XML files). And I need to balance out everything before I release it.[/quote]
I’ve implemented easy way to add objects on xEnts landscape editor, just click and object will be added. PM me if you want it.

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!

Why?

item.title: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!
item.dc:creator: @nwehrman11 nwehrman11
item.description:
@nwehrman11 wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:13, topic:392797”]The beginning of ur post, before the pictues, hyped me up to believe this was a pking server.

I then saw the well planned out edgeville layout, thinking this guy knows what hes doing, pumping me up more.

Then i saw the EXP rate and died a little inside…[/quote]

Absolutely agree. I like the whole setup and your ideas are really cool, like having to make your own armour and stuff, but with XP rates that low, not many people will want to spend days and days and days just to get some rune, and the people that do will make the prices ridiculous.

My advice, obviously, is to raise the XP rate… Quite a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:5, topic:392797”][quote author=Kapitein Bier link=topic=489964.msg3582561#msg3582561 date=1303912478]

good luck, bad time to release imo though

RSC Mini is not being released yet. I want it to be fully finished before it gets released.
[/quote]
Ignore him, hes trying to drop hints at something else,

OT: Looks like some effort and thought went into the setup, good idea to shrink the map a bit. Exactly how much is getting cut out, if i may ask, just edgeville and wild left?[/quote]

Yes, only the Edgeville, the Dungeon below it and the Wilderness is left. We might expand the map later with new features, such as a woodcut guild in Barbarian Village or w/e. But we don’t want to use the whole map, I’ve always hated to walk around everywhere on RSC, instead of having to teleport everytime, I just shrink the map

item.title: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

Summary!
RSC Mini is yet another RSC Private Server, but this time we have cut the world map!

We have left Edgeville and the wilderness and added skilling possibilities to this map. Edgeville is the Home-Town and there are no more shops where you can buy your armour, weapons or accesories at.

It’s all about manufacturing your own weaponry to engage the great wilderness fights or get that rare loot from one of the wilds most feared monsters.

Check out these awesome screenshots below!

Overall View of the new Edgeville:

Fishing spot and fishermans shop:

Certers in Edgeville (Dragon Bone certer and Potion certer will be added somewhere later)

Woodcut possibilities (Willows next to Mining entrance and Oaks over the map)

Crafters workshop

New Mining Guild (No requirements to enter)

Smithing workshop (And crafting gold ofcourse)

RSC Mini Features:

  • Herblaw shop in Edgeville
  • Mining Guild located below Edgeville
  • All sorts of trees in Edgeville
  • Redone Edgeville Dungeon with other NPC’s
  • Low Level Fishing in Edgeville
  • High Level Fishing by taking the boat from Edgeville to an Island
  • Smithing and Crafting in the Old Edgeville Men-House
  • Clay, Gold and Silver mine located below Edgeville
  • Chaos Druids close to bank to gather Herbs for Herblaw.
  • World Drop feature that drops a specific item all over the world.
  • Partyroom Drop Feature that drops a specific item multiple times in the party room.
  • RSC Angels “Global War”
  • Cow Farm east of Edgeville to train Crafting and low level combat training.

Upcoming Features:

  • Better magic and ranging posibilities
  • A Subscribers only house with a dungeon for high level training and better skilling possibilities (slightly easier to gather/bank items)
  • Add the “Charge Dragonstone Amulet” fountain to the Subscribers house
  • etc

RSC Mini Teaser Video!
http://videobam.com/wsjHo

FAQ:
Q: When is RSC Mini going to be released?
A: We do not have an estimated release date yet, there is still a lot that needs to be done

Q: How do I get armour and weapons when there are no shops?
A: You will either have to manufacture your own, buy it from other people or get it as a drop from a npc.

Q: What will the EXP Rate be?
A: I still need to decide this, but I’m thinking about x12 for non-subs and x16 for subscribers.

Staff Applications!
RSC Mini still needs staff, I have multiple jobs open!

Landscape Editor
Info: I need someone that helps making new dungeons, it is a pre if you can and know how to add NPC’s and GameObjects to this LandScape aswell!

Java developper
Info: Anyone that can help fix bugs is appreciated! A good java developper will also earn a part of the subscriptions.

Website developper
For now I am using a website released by sw0o0sh, if anyone is near as good as him and interested in working for RSC Mini, contact me!

Moderators
Info: I need a couple of Moderators that have past experience with RSC Private Servers, Moderators need to be mature, can speak decent English and trustworthy.

You may either post here, but you can also whisper me if interested!

Let us know what you think about this project, suggestions are welcome too!

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Mini, New Upcoming RSC PServer!
